channel.title: [PI] Clicking items help?

item.title: [PI] Clicking items help?
item.dc:creator: @Driman_Rune Driman Rune
item.description:
@Driman_Rune wrote:

Their can’t be a interference or whatever because all your items are defined, and their all used in hunter.java and clickitem.java, except that impling is like nulled or something.

Why not simply change the item id =-p? 20% chance it will work or something.

I’m totally lost on this.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Clicking items help?

item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

[quote=“Driman Rune, post:6, topic:524567”]So basically it works on everything else besides that?

Check if your item id is defined in item.cfg or whatever file all items are.[/quote]

Yes exactly, and yes they are all defined in it.

item.title: [PI] Clicking items help?
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

[quote=“Driman Rune, post:4, topic:524567”]This is hard…

Why don’t you try with your other impling jars, and let’s go from their.[/quote]

What do you mean? This is the rest of my impling jars. in Clickitem.java

/** Hunter Jars **/ //Implings if(itemId == 11238) {//Baby Impling jar c.getItems().deleteItem(11238,c.getItems().getItemSlot(11238),1); c.getItems().addItem(995,5000); //Coins } if(itemId == 11240) {//Young Impling jar c.getItems().deleteItem(11240,c.getItems().getItemSlot(11240),1); c.getItems().addItem(995,8000); //Coins } if(itemId == 11242) {//Gourmet Impling jar c.getItems().deleteItem(11242,c.getItems().getItemSlot(11242),1); c.getItems().addItem(995,12000); //Coins } if(itemId == 11244) {//Earth Impling jar c.getItems().deleteItem(11244,c.getItems().getItemSlot(11244),1); c.getItems().addItem(995,15000); //Coins } if(itemId == 11246) {//Essence Impling jar c.getItems().deleteItem(11246,c.getItems().getItemSlot(11246),1); c.getItems().addItem(995,17500); //Coins } if(itemId == 11248) {//Eclectic Impling jar c.getItems().deleteItem(11248,c.getItems().getItemSlot(11248),1); c.getItems().addItem(995,20000); //Coins } if(itemId == 11250) {//Nature Impling jar c.getItems().deleteItem(11250,c.getItems().getItemSlot(11250),1); c.getItems().addItem(995,22500); //Coins } if(itemId == 11252) {//Magpie Impling jar c.getItems().deleteItem(11252,c.getItems().getItemSlot(11252),1); c.getItems().addItem(995,25000); //Coins } if(itemId == 11254) {//Ninja Impling jar c.getItems().deleteItem(11254,c.getItems().getItemSlot(11254),1); c.getItems().addItem(995,27500); //Coins } if(itemId == 11256) {//Dragon Impling jar c.getItems().deleteItem(11256,c.getItems().getItemSlot(11256),1); c.getItems().addItem(995,29999); //Coins } /** End of Hunter Jars **/

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Clicking items help?
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

I figured out that if I just changed the item id to something else it worked, it’s just the impling jars doing that. I believe my hunter class is interferring with that. So I updated my thread with it.

item.title: [PI] Clicking items help?
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

So I’m trying to make it so when you click an impling jar it gives you money, I knew this would be the easiest thing to make but I’m having this weird problem with it. So what I did was get the code off an old item I made that gives you money when you click on it and I just changed the item id on it to the impling jar one.
This is the original code if(itemId == 15001) { //Original Item c.getItems().deleteItem(15001,c.getItems().getItemSlot(15001),1); c.getItems().addItem(1514,500); //Magic Logs c.getItems().addItem(452,500); //Runite ore c.getItems().addItem(384,500); //Raw Sharks }

I changed that to this if(itemId == 11238) {//Baby Impling jar c.getItems().deleteItem(11238,c.getItems().getItemSlot(11238),1); c.getItems().addItem(995,5000); //Coins }

But whenever I click on the impling jar nothing happens. I don’t get it…If you could help me with this it would mean a lot. Thank you!

EDIT: I changed the id on that piece of code again to something else and it worked. So I’m guessing it’s just the impling jars doing that. But I still don’t get why it’s doing that. I think my hunter class is interferring here it is.

[code]package server.model.players.skills;

import java.util.HashMap;

import server.model.items.Item;
import server.model.players.Client;
import server.util.Misc;

public class Hunter {

/**
 * @author Imsuperman05
 * @version 1.5;
 * 
 * I give permission for RiiPiiNFtW to release this
 * on rune-server.org.
 * 
 * I have no use for it anymore, and I want to
 * give back to the rune-server community that
 * I have treated horribly.
 * 
 * We have some room to improve.
 * C&P suggestions from forums onto here.
 * 
 */

final Client c;

public Hunter(final Client Client) {
	c = Client;
}

/**
 * Constant variables that can be changed at any time
 * instead of changing every single calling method
 * handling it.
 */
int HunterAnim = 6999;
int netNeeded = 10010;

static enum Implings {
	/**
	 * Baby Impling.
	 */
	BABY( "Baby Impling", 11238, 1500, 1, 6055 ),
	/**
	 * Young Impling.
	 */
	YOUNG( "Young Impling", 11240, 3500, 17, 6056 ),
	/**
	 * Gourmet Impling.
	 */
	GOURMET( "Gourmet Impling", 11242, 5000, 28, 6057),
	/**
	 * Earth Impling.
	 */
	EARTH( "Earth Impling", 11244, 5000, 36, 6058 ),
	/**
	 * Essence Impling.
	 */
	ESSENCE( "Essence Impling", 11246, 6000, 42, 6059 ),
	/**
	 * Eclectic Impling.
	 */
	ECLECTIC( "Eclectic Impling", 11248, 8000, 50, 6060),
	/**
	 * Nature Impling.
	 */
	NATURE( "Nature Impling", 11250, 10000, 58,6061 ),
	/**
	 * Magpie Impling.
	 */
	MAGPIE( "Magpie Impling", 11252, 12500, 65, 6062 ),
	/**
	 * Ninja Impling.
	 */
	NINJA( "Ninja Impling", 11254, 14000, 74, 6063 ),
	/**
	 * Dragon Impling.
	 */
	DRAGON( "Dragon Impling", 11256, 16000, 83, 6064 );
			
	
	/**
	 * Variables.
	 */
	String name;
	int JarAdded, XPAdded, LevelNeed, Npc;
	
	/**
	 * Creating the HashMap.
	 */
	static HashMap<Integer, Implings> hunted = new HashMap<Integer, Implings>();
	
	/**
	 * Populates the map.
	 */
	static {
		for(Implings i : Implings.values())
			Implings.hunted.put(i.JarAdded, i);
	}

	/**
	 * Creating the Impling.
	 * @param name
	 * @param JarAdded
	 * @param XPAdded
	 * @param LevelNeed
	 * @param Npc
	 */
	Implings(String name, int JarAdded, int XPAdded, int LevelNeed, int Npc) {
		this.name = name;
		this.JarAdded = JarAdded;
		this.XPAdded = XPAdded;
		this.LevelNeed = LevelNeed;
		this.Npc = Npc;
	}
}

static enum Otherhunternpcs {
	/**
	 * Black warlock.
	 */
	BLACKWARLOCK( "Black Warlock", 10014, 23000, 95, 5082 ),
	/**
	 * Snowy Knight,
	 */
	SNOWY( "Snowy Knight", 10016, 20000, 90, 5083 ),
	/**
	 * Sapphire Glacialis.
	 */
	SAPPHIRE( "Sapphire Glacialis", 10018, 18500, 85, 5084 ),
	/**
	 * Ruby Harvast.
	 */
	RUBY( "Ruby Harvast", 10020, 18000, 80, 5085);
	
	/**
	 * Variables.
	 */
	String name;
	int JarAdded, XPAdded, LevelNeed, Npc;
	
	/**
	 * Creating the HashMap.
	 */
	static HashMap<Integer, Otherhunternpcs> hunted = new HashMap<Integer, Otherhunternpcs>();
	
	/**
	 * Populates the map.
	 */
	static {
		for(Otherhunternpcs i : Otherhunternpcs.values())
			Otherhunternpcs.hunted.put(i.JarAdded, i);
	}

	/**
	 * Creating the Other hunted npcs.
	 * @param name
	 * @param JarAdded
	 * @param XPAdded
	 * @param LevelNeed
	 * @param Npc
	 */
	Otherhunternpcs(String name, int JarAdded, int XPAdded, int LevelNeed, int Npc) {
		this.name = name;
		this.JarAdded = JarAdded;
		this.XPAdded = XPAdded;
		this.LevelNeed = LevelNeed;
		this.Npc = Npc;
	}
}

/**
 * Boolean to check everything.
 * @param NpcClicked
 * @return
 */
public boolean hasReqs(int NpcClicked) {
	for(Otherhunternpcs o : Otherhunternpcs.values()) {
	if(NpcClicked == o.Npc) {
		if(c.playerLevel[c.playerHunter] >= o.LevelNeed) {
			if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == netNeeded) {
				if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) {
						return true;
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("[<col=278488>*</col>]You have no inventory space.");
					return false;
				}
			} else {
				c.sendMessage("[<col=278488>*</col>]You need a butterfly net to catch this imp.");
				return false;
			}
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("[<col=278488>*</col>]You need a Hunter level of " + o.LevelNeed + " to catch this imp.");
			return false;
			}
		}
	}
	for(Implings o : Implings.values()) {
		if(NpcClicked == o.Npc) {
			if(c.playerLevel[c.playerHunter] >= o.LevelNeed) {
				if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == netNeeded) {
					if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) {
							return true;
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("[<col=278488>*</col>]You have no inventory space.");
						return false;
					}
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("[<col=278488>*</col>]You need a butterfly net to catch this imp.");
					return false;
				}
			} else {
				c.sendMessage("[<col=278488>*</col>]You need a Hunter level of " + o.LevelNeed + " to catch this imp.");
				return false;
				}
			}
		}
	return false;
}

/**
 * Much simpler.
 * @param NpcClicked
 */
public void Checking(int NpcClicked) {
	for(Otherhunternpcs o : Otherhunternpcs.values()) {
			if(NpcClicked == o.Npc) {
					CatchOthers(o.name, o.JarAdded, o.XPAdded, o.LevelNeed);
		}
	}
	for(Implings i : Implings.values()) {
			if(NpcClicked == i.Npc) {
					CatchImps(i.name, i.JarAdded, i.XPAdded, i.LevelNeed);
		}
	}
}
/**
 * Cathing Imps method.
 * @param ImpName
 * @param JarAdded
 * @param XPAdded
 * @param LevelNeeded
 */

public void CatchImps(String ImpName, int JarAdded, int XPAdded, int LevelNeeded) {
		if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay >= 1500) {
			int RandomImp = Misc.random(20);
			switch(RandomImp) {
			case 10:
				c.sendMessage("You catch an Impling.");
				c.startAnimation(HunterAnim);
				c.getPA().addSkillXP(XPAdded * 2, 21);
			break;
			case 15:
				c.sendMessage("You catch an Impling.");
				c.startAnimation(HunterAnim);
				c.getPA().addSkillXP(XPAdded * 3, 21);
			break;
			case 20:
				c.sendMessage("You catch an Impling.");
				c.startAnimation(HunterAnim);
				c.getPA().addSkillXP(XPAdded * 4, 21);
				break;
			/*case 8:
				c.sendMessage("Oh noes!");
				EvilChicken.spawnEvil(c);
			break;*/
			default:
					c.sendMessage(new StringBuilder() .append("You catch a regular ")
							.append(ImpName) .append(", and receive a ") 
							.append(Item.getItemName(JarAdded).toLowerCase()) .append(".").toString());
						c.getPA().addSkillXP(XPAdded, 21);
						c.startAnimation(HunterAnim);
						c.getItems().addItem(JarAdded, 1);
					break;
				}
			c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
		}
}

/**
 * Catching other hunted npcs that aren't implings.
 * @param ImpName
 * @param JarAdded
 * @param XPAdded
 * @param LevelNeeded
 */
public void CatchOthers(String ImpName, int JarAdded, int XPAdded, int LevelNeeded) {
		if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay >= 1500) {
			int RandomImp = Misc.random(20);
			switch(RandomImp) {
			case 10:
				c.sendMessage("You catch an Impling.");
				c.startAnimation(HunterAnim);
				c.getPA().addSkillXP(XPAdded * 2, 21);
			break;
			case 15:
				c.sendMessage("You catch an Impling.");
				c.startAnimation(HunterAnim);
				c.getPA().addSkillXP(XPAdded * 3, 21);
			break;
			case 20:
				c.sendMessage("You catch an Impling.");
				c.startAnimation(HunterAnim);
				c.getPA().addSkillXP(XPAdded * 4, 21);
				break;
			/*case 8:
				c.sendMessage("Oh noes!");
				EvilChicken.spawnEvil(c);
			break;*/
			default:
					c.sendMessage(new StringBuilder() .append("You catch a regular ")
							.append(ImpName) .append(", and receive a ") 
							.append(Item.getItemName(JarAdded).toLowerCase()) .append(".").toString());
						c.getPA().addSkillXP(XPAdded, 21);
						c.startAnimation(HunterAnim);
						c.getItems().addItem(JarAdded, 1);
					break;
				}
			c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
		}
	}

}[/code]

Read full topic
